points.title: How to read and understand the Bible?

answers.title: Let God and His Spirit help
Gives orientation on our path through life
Their doctrine corresponds to the Bible
In it is the spirit of Christ
In it the word is confirmed by signs and wonders affirmed
In it is knowledge of Christ
The unity of blood, water and spirit
Attainment of the sonship of God
The baptist: Member of the true church
The baptist: Has received the Holy Spirit
The Spirit of God and Jesus

points.title: How does the Holy Spirit work?

answers.title: Testifies to the sonship of God
Receiving the Holy Spirit: speak in tongues
Receiving the Holy Spirit: is visible and audible

points.title: How do you receive the Holy Spirit?

answers.title: Believe in God and his word
Shows Jesus' great and perfect love
An example of humility and mutual love
We have fellowship with Christ and his church
We have part in the resurrection
Bread: The body of the Lord
Cup: the blood of the Lord

points.title: Sabbath observance in the New Testament

answers.title: Redemption to the Kingdom of God
Feared by the wicked and impenitent

points.title: For what does Christ come again?

answers.title: To take the believers to himself
To create a new heaven and a new earth
Be filled with the Holy Spirit
